评论详情: Took a long time to figure out how to get it on — might need a wardrobe assistant/ friend who is good a shapes and puzzles but very sexy and stretchy—- also has adjustable straps so you can really make it fit to your body. Love the vibrant color also! Great harness except it’s definitely a confusing garment to get into

Bra size 46DDD, idk if it helps but Im also 5'6  I've been losing a lot of weight and wanted something that would help preserve use for old clothes that was cute - this is amazing! I'm somewhere between size 22-24 I think but this thing could fit two of me, the whole thing is very expandable elastic. Also I have a big belly so things further down than my chest ride up, this still looks cute even when it starts to scrunch a bit! My boyfriend was a major fan too so definitely a crowd pleaser!  (I can still tighten and loosen it from this size. Although loosening it is really not necessary - trust me I was a size 32 a while back, this would have been perfectly fine then with room to spare )

I really like how comfortable these are. They have adjustable straps as well. At first I was a little confused on which part goes on were but picture reference definitely helps a lot. Elasticity is superb.

I ordered this in the Rose Red. It's super sexy. I wanted a harness look but not too over the top, and this fit my criteria. Now, just looking for the perfect components to wear with it for a photo shoot.

Sizing: Torrid 3. 22/24 3x Bust: 49" 44DDD Underbust: 44" Waist: 51.75" Neck: 18.75" Hips: 55" I absolutely love this type of harness. I get so many compliments when I go out. They are gorgeous over clothing and/or a bra. Didn't like it bare chested.
Fits perfectly, especially with the adjustable straps (I'm a 42DDD bra size).
